about_the_game:
Pazinko! brings the classic pachinko arcade experience to life with a modern twist! Dive into a fast-paced, frantic world of continuous ball launching, where precision and timing are key to maximizing your score. With dynamic levels and vibrant visuals, Pazinko keeps you on the edge of your seat as you guide chrome balls through intricate mazes of pegs, obstacles, and traps.

Whether you're aiming for the highest score or racing against time, Pazinko offers non-stop action for both casual players and pachinko enthusiasts alike. Can you master the chaos?

Key Features:

  • Chrome Ball Physics: The game's realistic physics engine adds depth and immersion, making every launch, bounce, and ricochet unpredictable and exhilarating.

  • Frantic Pachinko-like Gameplay: Experience the thrill of rapid-fire ball launching and nail-biting action as your Pazinko balls navigate through the complex peg layout.

  • Power-ups and Bonuses: Collect special power-ups to gain an edge like score multipliers, keeping you ahead of the competition.

  • Free Ball Mode: Unlimited balls and time. Relax and aim for your best score!

  • Blitz Ball Mode: 30 seconds, unlimited balls. How many points can you rack up?

  • Ball Buster Mode: Just 10 balls to start, unlimited time. Precision and skill are key. Good luck!

Coming Soon:

  • Score Challenges: Compete for high scores and dominate the leaderboards, mastering each level to claim your spot as the ultimate Pazinko champion.

  • Music!

  • Options screen for setting soundfx, music, etc. levels.

  • Customizable Pegboards: Unlock new designs and themes to personalize your pachinko experience, from retro arcade to futuristic neon aesthetics.

  • Controller support

  • Published Leaderboards

  • Other Community upvoted features!

Are you ready to test your reflexes and strategy in the ultimate pachinko experience? Pazinko is calling!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Pazinko!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Pazinko! is a fast-paced arcade pachinko game. Launch chrome balls through vibrant, dynamic pegboards. Test your reflexes and timing as you launch balls through a maze of obstacles, aiming for the highest score.
